Title: QR Code Reader (By Screen Capture)
Description:
Reads the QR Codes displayed in webpages. (You need to capture the code area)
Displays the code information.
HomeWiki:
Introduction

This is a project created in WPF. We have already seen QR Code reader by various devices, but ever imagined you could read it when you see the code on your screen.

The application reads the QR Code displayed in various web sites or on the software. 

Description

The application opens up in screen capture mode and you need to capture the area where the QR Code is displayed.

If it is a valid QR Code, the information is displayed as a Message.

The project is using ZXing (a.k.a Zebra Crossing) C# libraries to read the QR Code.
